speaker: Sarah Bird
title: Being Responsible with Generative AI
description:
Sarah Bird is back! On this week's episode, Sarah and Seth talk about the importance of being responsible with Generative AI like ChatGPT. Sarah will discuss some of the underlying responsible AI principles and how they fit together when building applications that rely on this technology. Sarah will also help Seth incorporate these principles into a demo app he built that does prompt construction and execution against Azure OpenAI's ChatGPT model.
